channel.title: Can't login
channel.description: well, i got ddsspeced source v1.5 and client v2 but i can't connect to the v2 client can someone tell me what i should do so i can log in?

item.title: Can't login
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

halflive9:

i did but didn’t found what i needed. the source need a specific client to connect to ist that located in gui.java or egui.java?

Specific client connection should be in signlink.java

Read full topic

item.title: Can't login
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:2, topic:340561”][quote author=halflive9 link=topic=436929.msg3210426#msg3210426 date=1274205518]
well, i got ddsspeced source v1.5 and client v2 but i can’t connect to the v2 client can someone tell me what i should do so i can log in?
[/quote]
i did but didn’t found what i needed. the source need a specific client to connect to ist that located in gui.java or egui.java?

Make sure you portforward, and have open ports.

Make sure you run the source, and the client is connecting to the ip…

All your questions have been answered before, use the search button next time.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Can't login
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

GUI or EGUI classes. Make sure it’s connecting to the correct IP.

@the_elve_age wrote:

halflive9:

well, i got ddsspeced source v1.5 and client v2 but i can’t connect to the v2 client can someone tell me what i should do so i can log in?

Make sure you portforward, and have open ports.

Make sure you run the source, and the client is connecting to the ip…

All your questions have been answered before, use the search button next time.
